name: White Cat Mountain Journey
description:
A very very short story game set in a colorful mountain range where you must travel back down to base camp while avoiding some wild white Bengal Tigers.

Developer Note:

This is a very very short game dev project/idea I made for my game dev school I'm enrolled in. Its not perfect by any means but is intended to learn how a game developer makes a playable level from beginning to end. Its completely free to play. My final assignment is to release it to the world regardless of how un-polished it is and the things it’s lacking after the timeframe given to complete the project which was only 7 days. To close the game, you can either win the game by reaching the end or by pressing Alt + F4. I know I apologize for it lacking a proper game menu/exit game UI. But it’s all a part of learning game dev from the very beginning I suppose :)

Thanks for playing!

~ ItsJustJr
